description: The Armstrongs, a family of impeccable pizza perfectionists, put together their constructive and culinary talents to bring the suburbs of Denver the Simply Pizza Truck. Just like this astonishing spectacle of a vessel, their doughs and sauces are completely made from scratch, ensuring the finest quality in every bite of their Neapolitan-style wood-fired selection. Everything on their mouthwatering menu is an absolute local favorite; from the Italian Meat Pizza (with hot Italian sausage, pepperoni, and genoa salami), to the Green Chili Chicken Pizza (with slow-braised chicken, green chili, onion, poblano peppers, and a dash of fresh cilantro), to the dessert pizza pies like the Raspberry Mascarpone (fresh raspberries with mascarpone cheese, vanilla, sugar, cinnamon, and a splash of creme, and semi-sweet chocolate). With all this deliciousness, you simply must come try everything from Simply Pizza Truck.
name: Simply Pizza Truck
